title: Through the Forest
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Gippsland (Vic.) - Description and travel
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest ecology - Australia
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest reserves
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forests and forestry - Australia
description: Episode of Series "Gippsland". One of a series of films about Gippsland, which gives an insight into this region and shows the full scope of natural phenomenon. The Mountain Ash provides food and shelter at all levels. From the forest floor where the lyrebird scavenges to the treetops which provide launch pads for the spectacular sugar gliders
